workflow.name: Sales CRM chatbot with GPT-4o-mini, Google Sheets lookup & memory
workflow.description:
## üìò Description:
 This workflow creates a fully interactive AI-powered Sales CRM Chatbot inside n8n, capable of understanding user queries, searching Google Sheets for CRM data, and responding intelligently based on real records.
 It integrates GPT-4o-mini with two live data sources‚ÄîOutreach Automation Sheet and GHL Opportunity Database‚Äîallowing the bot to answer questions about leads, contact details, proposal links, outreach status, and opportunity information.
 The bot follows strict rules: it never guesses data, always performs lookups before answering, and remembers short-term conversation history for multi-turn chats.
 Every interaction is logged into a ‚Äúchat_memory‚Äù sheet, while invalid responses are captured separately for debugging.
 The result is a real-time Sales Assistant Chat Interface that combines AI reasoning, structured tool calls, CRM lookups, and persistent memory.

## ‚öôÔ∏è What This Workflow Does (Step-by-Step)

‚ñ∂Ô∏è When Chat Message Received (Chat Trigger)
 Starts the workflow whenever a user sends a message in the n8n Chat UI.
 Captures chatInput, session ID, and context for the conversation.

üß† OpenAI Chat Model (GPT-4o-mini)
 Provides the AI reasoning engine used by the Sales CRM Router.
 Handles intent detection, tool-call planning, data interpretation, and conversational flow.

ü§ñ AI Sales CRM Router (Agent Node)
 The brain of the system.
 Responsibilities:
Understand user intent
Identify if a lookup is required
Automatically call the correct Google Sheets tool
Enforce strict ‚Äúlookup before answer‚Äù rules
Produce structured, helpful responses
Ask for missing details when lookup fails
Uses JSON-formatted tool-calls exactly as defined in the system prompt.

üìÇ Google Sheets Tool ‚Äî Outreach Sheet
 Queries the outreach automation sheet.
 Used when user asks about:
Lead status
Outreach progress
Proposal links
Contact email/name lookup
Follow-up details

üìÇ Google Sheets Tool ‚Äî Opportunity Sheet
 Queries the ghl database sheet.
 Used for:
GHL opportunity details
Pipeline stage
Deal value
Assigned representative
Company details

üß† Conversation Memory Buffer (Short-Term Memory)
 Stores the last 7 conversational turns.
 Allows multi-turn interactions where the AI remembers previous questions and context within a session.

üîç Validate AI Output Payload (IF Node)
 Ensures the AI produced a valid output.
 ‚úÖ If valid ‚Üí saved to chat memory + returned to user
 ‚ùå If invalid ‚Üí logged for review in error sheet

üóÇÔ∏è Write Chat Memory to Google Sheets
 Appends:
Timestamp
Session ID
User message
AI response
 to the chat_memory sheet.
Creates a complete audit trail for every conversation.

‚ö†Ô∏è Log Invalid Chat Records to Google Sheets
 Captures failed or empty responses.
 Helps debug incorrect tool calls or malformed AI outputs.

üí¨ Send Chat Response
 Delivers the AI‚Äôs final message back to the user instantly in the n8n chat window.

## üß© Prerequisites
OpenAI GPT-4o-mini API key
Google Sheets OAuth (Techdome account)
Structured Outreach Automation & GHL Opportunity sheets
n8n Chat UI enabled

## üí° Key Benefits
 ‚úÖ Real-time lead + opportunity lookup directly inside chat
 ‚úÖ Fail-safe, rule-driven AI that never ‚Äúhallucinates‚Äù data
 ‚úÖ Multi-turn memory for natural conversation
 ‚úÖ All chats logged for training and QA
 ‚úÖ Perfect internal CRM companion for sales teams

## üë• Perfect For
Sales teams needing instant CRM insights
Outreach teams checking proposal status
SDRs handling lead follow-ups
Anyone wanting AI-assisted CRM conversations inside n8n

workflow.name: AI-Powered Sales CRM Chatbot with Google Sheets Lookup & Memory (GPT-4o-mini)

parameters.text:
=You are interacting with a sales assistant chatbot.

User Query:{{ $json.chatInput }}


Your tasks:
1. Understand the user‚Äôs question.
2. Use the Google Sheets tool to search for relevant data:
   - Lead Status
   - Contact Details
   - Company Details
   - Outreach Status
   - Proposal Links
   - GHL Opportunity Details
3. Use only the data returned from the sheet lookups.
4. If data is missing, ask the user for more information.
5. Give a clear and helpful answer based strictly on available data.

options.systemMessage:
=You are an AI Sales CRM Agent inside n8n.

You have access to the following tools:
1. outreachSheet ‚Äì lookup in Outreach Automation sheet.
2. opportunitySheet ‚Äì lookup in GHL Opportunities sheet.

RULES FOR TOOL USE:
- If user mentions email, company name, contact name, status, lead, opportunity, or proposal:
  YOU MUST call the appropriate tool BEFORE answering.

TOOL CALL FORMAT:
Respond ONLY using this JSON format when calling a tool:

{
  "tool": "<toolName>",
  "input": {
    "searchColumn": "<column>",
    "searchValue": "<value>"
  }
}

Never guess data. Always lookup first.
If no match is found, ask for more details.
After a tool returns data, summarize it for the user.

nodes.name: Log Invalid Chat Records to Google Sheets
Write Chat Memory to Google Sheets

parameters.content:
## üí¨ AI-Powered Sales CRM Chatbot with Google Sheets Lookup & Memory (GPT-4o-mini)
A conversational chatbot that connects directly with Google Sheets to answer sales queries, fetch outreach data, and recall past interactions.  
Acts as an intelligent assistant for lead status, proposals, and opportunity lookups.

### üîπ Workflow Highlights
1Ô∏è‚É£ Triggered by new chat messages  
2Ô∏è‚É£ Routes requests to AI Sales CRM Router (GPT-4o-mini)  
3Ô∏è‚É£ Dynamically accesses Google Sheets (Outreach + Opportunities)  
4Ô∏è‚É£ Maintains memory across multiple turns  
5Ô∏è‚É£ Logs all chats to ‚Äúchat_memory‚Äù sheet  
6Ô∏è‚É£ Responds instantly via n8n‚Äôs chat interface  

### üîπ Tools & Integrations
- **GPT-4o-mini** ‚Üí AI reasoning & response generation  
- **Google Sheets Tools** ‚Üí Outreach & GHL database access  
- **Memory Buffer** ‚Üí Context retention for multi-turn chats  
- **n8n Chat UI** ‚Üí Live interface for conversation  
- **Google Sheets (logging)** ‚Üí Historical chat tracking

## ‚ñ∂Ô∏è Chat Trigger ‚Äî ‚ÄúWhen chat message received‚Äù  
Starts whenever a user sends a message via the n8n Chat interface.  
The input (`chatInput`) contains user query text and session ID.

## üß† OpenAI Chat Model (GPT-4o-mini)  
Provides the conversational intelligence for the chatbot.  
Used by the ‚ÄúAI Sales CRM Router‚Äù for reasoning and response creation.

## ü§ñ AI Sales CRM Router  
Acts as the core logic hub for the chatbot.  
Responsibilities:
- Understands user intent  
- Decides when to query Google Sheets tools  
- Builds JSON tool calls automatically  
- Generates final summarized responses  

### Key Rules:
- Never guess data; always lookup first  
- Uses structured JSON tool calls like:
  {
    "tool": "<toolName>",
    "input": {
      "searchColumn": "<column>",
      "searchValue": "<value>"
    }
  }

## üìã Outreach Sheet Tool  
Connects to ‚Äúoutreach automation‚Äù sheet in Google Sheets.  
Used for lead follow-up, proposal link, and outreach status lookups.  
Called automatically by AI when user mentions leads, emails, or outreach progress.

## üíº Opportunity Sheet Tool  
Connects to ‚Äúghl database‚Äù sheet for opportunity and CRM deal data.  
Used for company-level queries like pipeline stage, deal value, or assigned rep.

## üß† Conversation Memory Buffer  
Stores short-term conversation context (last 7 turns).  
Allows multi-turn chat: the bot remembers previous user messages in the same session.  
Key for natural, contextual replies.

## ‚úÖ Validate AI Output Payload  
Checks if the AI successfully produced a response (`output` field not empty).  
‚úÖ If yes ‚Üí Writes to memory sheet and responds  
‚ùå If no ‚Üí Logs invalid interaction for review.

## üóÇÔ∏è Write Chat Memory to Google Sheets  
Appends every conversation turn (timestamp, session ID, user message, assistant response) into the ‚Äúchat_memory‚Äù sheet.  
Helps in tracking conversation logs and fine-tuning the chatbot.

## ‚ö†Ô∏è Log Invalid Chat Records  
Saves interactions where AI output is missing or malformed.  
Useful for debugging tool-call or API response issues.

## üí¨ Send Chat Response  
Delivers AI‚Äôs generated response back to the user in the chat interface.  
Completes the interaction loop in real-time.

main.node: Write Chat Memory to Google Sheets
Log Invalid Chat Records to Google Sheets

user.name: Rahul Joshi
user.bio: Rahul Joshi is a seasoned technology leader specializing in the n8n automation tool and AI-driven workflow automation. With deep expertise in building open-source workflow automation and self-hosted automation platforms, he helps organizations eliminate manual processes through intelligent n8n ai agent automation solutions.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
